title: Highland beef salad
description: A hearty salad brimming with South-East Asian flavours. Great as a lighter barbecue dish or a quick supper.Each serving provides 338kcal, 37g protein, 11g carbohydrate (of which 12g sugars), 16g fat (of which 4g saturates), 1g fibre and 2g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp fresh coriander, plus extra for the salad
